page.title: 15Social concern - Old people.
page.content: There are 4 residential homes in the area for elderly people. Holehird, on the Patterdale road and also the base of the Lake District Horticultural Society, is one of the Cheshire homes. It accomodates 30 handicapped people in a fine lakeland stone house set in beautiful grounds. Over 40 people help at the home and Round Table is one of the local support groups. Robert was the only local person in the home and had been there 19 years. He enjoyed it because he did not feel isolated from other people, they were allowed as many visitors as they liked. He had his own little garden as well.
